testcase.name: hearthstone-log-watcher constructor should override the options with passed in values.
testcase.classname: should override the options with passed in values.

testcase.name: hearthstone-log-watcher instance should allow the watcher to be started and stopped.
testcase.classname: should allow the watcher to be started and stopped.

testcase.name: hearthstone-log-watcher executor parses a log file
hearthstone-log-watcher new player parsing returns player ids
hearthstone-log-watcher new player parsing matches a new player name
hearthstone-log-watcher handle zone changes handles a normal game card
hearthstone-log-watcher handle zone changes handles heros
hearthstone-log-watcher handle zone changes emits game start event when two heros have moved
testcase.classname: emits game start event when two heros have moved

testcase.name: hearthstone-log-watcher game over state handles a win/lost condition
hearthstone-log-watcher game over state emits game over event when both players have their status updated
testcase.classname: emits game over event when both players have their status updated
